barker_notes.barker_summary: Certificate of scholarship and conduct for Stephen F. Austin.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 144

div1.p: Certificate of scholarship and conduct for Stephen F. Austin.

This certifies that the bearer Stephen F. Austin has been a member of this Institution and a Boarder in my family, most of the time, for Three Years past. As a Scholar he has been obedient and studious; as a boarder, unexceptionable. Having passed acceptably the public examinations, and having during the whole period sustained a good MORAL character, he is judged worthy of this honorary testimonial.
By order of the Trustees in such cases, provided.
